channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 本周三，欧盟一项旨在清理企业供应链的法律受阻，迫使谈判人员重新回到有史以来最具影响的环境、社会和公司治理立法的绘图板上。
item.description:
A European Union law designed to clean up corporate supply chains was blocked on Wednesday, forcing negotiators back to the drawing board on one of the most consequential pieces of ESG legislation ever attempted https://t.co/4z990bPuI6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 一级方程式与卡塔尔体育广播公司 BeIN 签订为期 10 年的协议，独家报道其在中东、非洲和土耳其 25 个国家举办的赛事
item.description:
Formula 1 signs a 10-year deal with Qatari sports broadcaster BeIN for exclusive coverage of its races across 25 countries in the Middle East, Africa and Turkey https://t.co/eHf6cunwwv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 大型科技股创造了美国的万亿美元俱乐部，迄今为止一直占据主导地位。这也是第一次有外来者酝酿加入他们的行列。
item.description:
Big Tech stocks created, and have so far dominated, the trillion-dollar club in the US. For the first time, there’s a race brewing for an outsider to join their ranks. https://t.co/FTE0IdvC5U

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 英国股市陷入困境，首次公开募股（IPO）越来越少，交易量仅为 2008 年全球金融危机前的一小部分。以下是所有问题的症结所在
item.description:
The UK's stock market is in trouble, with IPOs increasingly rare and trading volume a fraction of its level before the 2008 global financial crisis. Here's how it all went wrong https://t.co/llhUGVwyBw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 一群前 FTX 和 Alameda Research 的员工筹集了 1700 万美元，用于建立一个名为 Backpack 的加密货币交易所。
item.description:
A group of former FTX and Alameda Research employees has raised $17 million to build out a crypto exchange called Backpack https://t.co/w5I7Ea0ija

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在欧洲央行下周召开政策会议之前，交易商押注欧元将走软，货币将出现更大波动
item.description:
Traders are betting on weakness in the euro and greater swings in the currency ahead of the ECB’s policy meeting next week https://t.co/tHwpFtHfTC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 经营廉价航空公司亚航的马来西亚 Capital A 公司同意以 11.5 亿美元将其品牌管理部门与一家在纳斯达克上市的空白公司合并的计划条款
item.description:
Malaysia’s Capital A — which operates low-cost carrier AirAsia — agrees to terms for a planned $1.15 billion merger of its brand management unit with a Nasdaq-listed blank-check company https://t.co/iOmwUVJN3j

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: @MathisWilliam 写道：欧洲电力系统的清洁速度之快，摧毁了对排放许可证的需求
item.description:
Europe's power system is cleaning up so fast it’s destroying demand for emission permits, writes @MathisWilliam https://t.co/YIjsEZaX3P

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 新加坡将购买 8 架 F-35A 战斗机，于 2030 年左右交付，为新加坡机队再添一批现代化飞机
item.description:
Singapore will acquire eight F-35A fighter jets to be delivered around 2030, adding another tranche of modern aircraft to the city-state’s fleet https://t.co/CYUdsd6O15

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: Binance 推出一项计划，希望在全球最大的加密货币交易所失去市场份额的同时，从传统市场吸引一批新的交易者。
item.description:
Binance is launching a program that it hopes will attract a new cohort of traders from traditional markets while the world’s biggest cryptocurrency exchange loses market share https://t.co/BDUmJabmgF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 由于抵押贷款利率维持在 7% 以上，美国购房申请量连续第五周下降，接近 1995 年以来的最低水平
item.description:
A gauge of US applications for home purchases dropped for a fifth week, approaching the lowest level since 1995 as mortgage rates held above 7% https://t.co/sT5ahEHgbr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 路透社报道：欧洲央行卡齐米尔倾向于 6 月首次降息

item.title: 达拉斯联储主席洛丽-罗根过去在 "量化紧缩 "方面的经验让 1400 英里之外的华尔街投资者向她寻求指导
item.description:
Dallas Fed chief Lorie Logan's past experience with "quantitative tightening" has Wall Street investors 1,400 miles away turning to her for guidance https://t.co/3AWJM6IfcZ

item.title: 瑞士建材制造商 Holcim 公司首席执行官表示，该公司计划在北美分拆上市，其发展速度可能会超过欧洲同行
item.description:
Swiss building materials maker Holcim’s planned North America spin off will likely grow faster than its European counterpart, says the firm's CEO https://t.co/AQRzC9wljC

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行（Royal Bank of Canada）的业绩超出分析师预期，原因是该行资本市场和财富管理业务的表现强于预期，抵消了贷款损失准备金的增加和支出的增加。
item.description:
Royal Bank of Canada beat analysts’ estimates as stronger-than-expected performance in the firm’s capital-markets and wealth-management businesses countered an increase in loan-loss provisions and higher expenses https://t.co/p0YbUoFOY5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在 Klarna 称其人工智能助手能胜任 700 名全职座席人员的工作后，法国呼叫中心公司 Teleperformance 的股价下跌高达 28
item.description:
Shares in French call-center firm Teleperformance sink as much as 28% after Klarna says its AI assistant does the work of 700 full-time agents https://t.co/huNl7hhuT8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: "印度航空公司首席执行官坎贝尔-威尔逊（Campbell Wilson）在新加坡航空节上告诉 @avrilhongTV 说："目前，我们还能很好地避免交付延误。
item.description:
“For the moment we are reasonably well insulated” from delivery delays, Air India CEO Campbell Wilson tells @avrilhongTV at the Singapore Aviation Festival.

Here's how the airline is trying to plug potential capacity gaps https://t.co/Dce4Qt7yN8 pic.twitter.com/ElPEZyvGfd

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) February 28, 2024

item.title: 瑞典加入北约的时间可能会推迟到下周，因为匈牙利当选总统仍需就职
item.description:
Sweden's membership of NATO will likely be delayed to next week because Hungary’s president-elect still needs to take office https://t.co/3SrefZzSAl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: "IndiGo 首席执行官 Pieter Elbers 在新加坡航空节上接受 @avrilhongTV 的独家专访时表示："我们已经实现了我们的运力目标。
item.description:
“We have been able to live up to our capacity guidance,” IndiGo CEO Pieter Elbers tells @avrilhongTV in an exclusive interview at the Singapore Aviation Festival.

Here's how the airline is supplementing the supply of new jets https://t.co/Dce4Qt7yN8 pic.twitter.com/Vq9BZr6hkZ

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) February 28, 2024

item.title: 极端主义的蔓延给央行行长们带来了挑战：面对他们认为对本国经济构成威胁的政策，他们应该在多大程度上偏离中立？
item.description:
The spread of extremism poses a challenge to central bankers: How far should they veer from neutrality in the face of policies they consider a threat to their economies? https://t.co/9qxeO1XcqZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 一家对冲基金自 2015 年成立以来每年都取得收益，该基金正押注新兴市场受困主权国家的反弹
item.description:
A hedge fund that has posted gains every year since its inception in 2015 is betting on a rally in distressed emerging-market sovereigns https://t.co/0Y5fiuTIFu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在数千名实习医生因抗议政府增加医学院名额的计划而离职后，韩国实习医生计划在最后复工期限过后继续维持他们的劳工行动。
item.description:
South Korean trainee doctors plan to maintain their labor action past a deadline to return to work after thousands walked off the job to protest a government plan to increase medical school seats https://t.co/JbC8QdOIOD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 今年迄今为止，投资者在欧洲新债券销售中的出价达到创纪录的 2.6 万亿欧元，因为现金充裕的投资者纷纷涌入企业和公共部门债务领域
item.description:
Investors have bid a record €2.6 trillion for new bond sales in Europe so far this year as cash-rich investors plie into corporate and public-sector debt https://t.co/G64Zj9YdYd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024
